title: Pasteur Center
description:
The Pasteur Center is is a Surgery-specialized medical center dedicated to people of all ages, located in Milan.It guarantees access to Surgery services such as adenotonillectomy, laparotomy, breast surgery and more.

Located in the centre of the Città Studi area, it is one of the core buildings of the ML Health clinic: it employs more 100 health specialists (including doctors, nurses and other assistants) and is equipped with 50 recovery beds, with full support to people with difficulties in walking.

The Center includes a very modern structure, built in 2001, that has 6 floors and has an extension of 11.700 square meters; it is one of the most technologically advanced clinic in Milan, due to the presence of the latest generation diagnostic equipment in all our laboratories and aid rooms.

title: Moser Center
description:
The Moser Centre, which is the most modern centre of our network, gathers all the radiology and dentistry services and is also a hub for congresses. Located in via Pacini, this centre employs more than 100 health specialists and is equipped with 65 recovery beds; moreover, it features state-of-the-art technology and machinery to support any kind of intervention.
The center has 4 floors and an extension of 8.500 square meters.

title: Darwin Center
description:
The Darwin Center is is a medical center dedicated to people of all ages, located in Milan and specialized in dermatology and pediatrics services.

Located in the centre of the Città Studi area, it is one of the core buildings of the ML Health clinic: it employs more 90 health specialists (including doctors, nurses and other assistants) and is equipped with 30 recovery beds, with full support to people with difficulties in walking.

The Center includes a very modern structure, built in 2006, that has 5 floors and has an extension of 10.500 square meters; it is one of the most technologically advanced clinic in Milan, due to the presence of the latest generation diagnostic equipment in all our laboratories and aid rooms.
